explanation: The stage direction primarily describes the character, Le Prince, interacting with and manipulating various objects such as his nightcap, dressing gown, jacket, belt, kneepads, and shoes. This type of action fits well into the category `object`, as it involves dressing and handling items.
stgdir: Le Prince ôte son bonnet de nuit et sa robe de chambre met par dessus sa résille, le bonnet de Barogo, sa veste par-dessus le gilet de dessous, la gratoire à sa ceinture, les genouillères à ses genoux, et les souliers à la place de ses pantoufles.
